name: Meteora-app
title: METEORA
description: Backend is built on NestJ+Socket.io stack, and frontend implements feature-sliced architecture https://feature-sliced.design . By the way, this app supposed to be a Telegram killer. While using this app you experience an incredible trip to distant planets.

name: Retro-game-app
title: RETRO GAME COLLECTION
description: App is focused on helping retro game geeks to find new lots on ebay and maintain their collection. Pure nostalgia included.
